title: Dr. Zoltan Rona | Naturally Savvy
cleaned_text:
Dr. Zoltan P. Rona has a Master’s Degree in Biochemistry and Clinical Nutrition from the University of Bridgeport in Connecticut (1984). He is past president of The Holistic Medical Association (1987–88). He is the author of three bestsellers, The Joy of Health (1991), Return to the Joy of Health (1995), and Childhood Illness and The Allergy Connection (1997). He is co-author with Jeanne Marie Martin of The Complete Candida Yeast Guidebook (1996) and is the medical editor of the Benjamin Franklin Award-winning Encyclopedia of Natural Healing (1998). Dr. Rona has had a private medical practice for the past 27 years, has appeared on radio and TV, and has lectured extensively in the U.S. and Canada.

To reach Dr. Rona, please email him at: drrona(at)naturallysavvy(dot)com or visit his website at: www.mydoctor.ca/drzoltanrona
